channel.title: How to Add Custom Monsters
channel.description: Erm guys i was wondering how to add custom monsters in rsps Servers I am using blank source so pls help me !

item.title: How to Add Custom Monsters
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:3, topic:375275”][quote author=sonicforce41 link=topic=471230.msg3446381#msg3446381 date=1293468989]
Custom NPC’s are loaded from a client, To a NPC ID, that The Coder chose.
Choose a client with custom NPC and Look for a Custom NPC for 317 Tutorial.
[/quote]ith other words: WRONG SECTION[/quote]
Well at least help him a little with saying wrong section…

  1. Im going to assume this is Bluurs
  2. Go to the models folder, add your gzipped/.dat files
  3. Add your integers into your class 5 class
  4. Compile
  5. open the client and do “add model (####)”
    replace the #### with the item id
    or if your just to lazy to do that, do “add models”, which just adds every model in your models folder/readds them, so it will take a bit longer, once it says “models added successfully!” Or something similar, reload your client and bam!
    Make sure you add your item to item.cfg, item.java, and anywere else you need it (E.G if you need special attack and so on so forth)

Read full topic
